name: Ma Po Tofu
description: Tofu set in a spicy sauce, typically a thin, oily, and bright red suspension, based on douban, and douchi, along with minced meat, traditionally beef.

name: Szechuan Bean Curd
description: Raw shredded bean curd, bean sprouts, carrots, and onions

description: Mix vegetables cooked over large saute pan with live oil and large garlic cloves.

description: Colorful, crunchy snow peas & mushrooms are lightly saut√©ed in butter and garlic.

description: Garlic , shallot cooked with bok choy and soy sauce.

name: Shredded Potatoes
description: Potatoes mashed and air fried with spicy garnishing.
